Summary: Saw 4 lights in sky while traveling north route 87. Appeared to be slightly large, dim stars. After observingf them for about an hour, 3 of them began to move around.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Lake George
There was one other sighting in Lake George on or around September 18th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsTraveling north on route 87, a noticed five "stars" that were slightly larger in appearance and dimmer than surrounding stars. Their positionm relative to each other seemed odd, ansd since I have a very high suspicion level, I kept looking at them as my wife was driving. Their positing in the sky relative to each other was as follows. 0 0 0 0 0 The structure, or pattern, that was formed appeared to me as too perfect. After about an hour of observing them, suddenly the upper two and the last one on the lower right began to move. I have seen so many of these and other unusial phenomena in the Adirondacks, that it is becoming old hat to me. Most of my sitings were in the vicinity of Sherman lake.
